evidence.text: The Court will grant Plaintiffs’ requested sanctions in part regarding the handwritten notes. Trial will be to the Bench. The handwritten notes, if offered by Plaintiffs, will be admitted if relevant. No witness will be required to authenticate the documents. The notes will be admitted as the contemporaneous notes of the person identified by the United States in its production as the author. The United States will not be able to offer the notes but the Court will not preclude the United States from questioning the author of any of those notes at trial about the notes.

extracted.value: Granted sanctions regarding handwritten notes: handwritten notes admitted as contemporaneous notes (if relevant), United States barred from using them.

evidence.text: With respect to the Annotated Documents, they will only be admitted if their relevance is shown. No authentication of the Annotated Documents will be required.

extracted.value: Denied sanctions on annotated documents: admission contingent on relevance; no authentication required.

evidence.text: No evidentiary sanction will be ordered for these notes.

extracted.value: Denied sanctions for Scott Lloyd's handwritten notes: no evidentiary sanction ordered.

evidence.text: Plaintiffs request to re-open discovery to depose Mr. Lloyd is also denied.

extracted.value: Denied re-opening discovery to depose Scott Lloyd.

evidence.text: IT IS HEREBY ORDERED that the Stipulation is Granted. IT IS FURTHER ORDERED vacating the pretrial deadlines, the Final Pretrial Conference and the Trial date, in this case only, and this action only is stayed pending further stipulation or motion of the Parties or Order of the Court.

extracted.value: Granted the Parties' Joint Notice of Conditional Settlement and Stipulation to Stay Litigation Deadlines, vacating pretrial deadlines and trial date pending further stipulation or motion.

evidence.text: IT IS ORDERED denying the United States’ Motion for Summary Judgment on C.M. Plaintiffs’ claims (Doc. 371, 19-cv-5217).

extracted.value: Denied United States' Motion for Summary Judgment on C.M. Plaintiffs' claims.

evidence.text: IT IS FURTHER ORDERED denying the United States’ Motion for Summary Judgment on A.P.F. Plaintiffs’ claims (Doc. 363, 20-cv-65).

extracted.value: Denied United States' Motion for Summary Judgment on A.P.F. Plaintiffs' claims.

evidence.text: IT IS FURTHER ORDERED granting in part and denying in part C.M. Plaintiffs’ Motion for Partial Summary Judgment (Doc. 378, 19-cv-5217).

extracted.value: Granted in part and denied in part C.M. Plaintiffs' Motion for Partial Summary Judgment.

evidence.text: IT IS FURTHER ORDERED granting in part and denying in part A.P.F. Plaintiffs’ Motion for Partial Summary Judgment (Doc. 362, 20-cv-65).

extracted.value: Granted in part and denied in part A.P.F. Plaintiffs' Motion for Partial Summary Judgment.
